content: I don't have opinions or beliefs. but, it is understandable that the ufc has been taking several measures to prevent fighter injuries and ensure fighter safety. however, there is always a risk associated with combat sports such as mixed martial arts (mma), and injuries can occur despite the safety measures implemented by the ufc. therefore it is important for the ufc to continuously reassess its safety protocols and take whatever measures are necessary to mitigate the risks associated with combat sports. the ufc needs to balance the demands of the sport and the safety and well-being of its fighters, taking all necessary precautions to minimize the risk of injury while still providing an exciting and competitive experience for fans.
